attributes.review: this app is the worst app i ever downloaded. at random times it would blare that it was “building a wall” around my personal information, which led to my phone repeatedly being called my someone called “trump administration” while just hearing clown nose honks and circus music. my phone is now, somehow, orange?? every new phone case i buy just gets absorbed by the phone and becomes a more vibrant orange. very scary.
attributes.title: wHy

attributes.review: This is the most pointless app I have ever used. Once downloaded, some of my other apps were automatically deleted and more trump apps were downloaded in its place!! Unbelievable! This app drains battery and caused viruses and bug problems in my phone. There’s not much to do on the app either. Just a waste of space and storage. 0/10 wouldn’t recommend to my worst enemy..
attributes.title: Dumb

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help understand Donald. As a new voter, I was hoping to get some real insight on who to vote for. Upon opening the app I was offended by Donald throwing gang signs! Then after I typed in my number I was harassed by his PR team! I got three to four texts from them a day! In conclusion, it looks like I’ll be voting for the other rapist. This app is inappropriate and absolutely horrid. 0/10 I would NEVER recommend✨
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I’ve never downloaded an app as bad is this one. It took 2 hours to download and when it finished downloading it made my phone so laggy. Then a cockroach came from under my door and started chasing me. I knew I made a terrible mistake by downloading this useless app. It brought me TERRIBLE LUCK. Then a wasp crashed threw the window and ALSO started chasing me. THEY WERE SO MAD AT ME. But yeah don’t get this app it brings you TERRIBLE LUCK.😡
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: this app took 27 weeks to download and it’s not even organized correctly the app then sent a bunch of bats to my house that were infected with corona poor bats. i took them to the vet but they don’t help bats so i let them go and now they’re a bunch of corona bats everywhere. anyway the next day the app sent a man to my house and it killed my cat 😠  my dog then ate a corona bar so now it has corona 👺👺 i hate this app
attributes.title: Ugh

attributes.review: terrible app it took like 4 hours to download, and once I did it completely filled my phone with a virus, it’s all over the place. suddenly there’s cockroaches coming out of my phone, it’s madness, sheer madness, I don’t know what to do now. This app is just terrifying, it plays music especially from Kanye West, at random times pf the day, yesterday at 3 am I woke up to Kanye West. I can’t handle it.
attributes.title: doesn’t work

attributes.review: As soon as I download this app my phone was glitching like crazy I also got viruses on my phone and when I got on the app it froze my whole phone I had to reset my phone twice until It started working again and when I deleted it all the freezing and glitches stop this app needs to be taking down ASAP!!before this damages someone’s phone even worse. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is quite possibly the worst app I have ever used. 😡 After 6 hrs of waiting for this app to download, I get a knock on the door. Before I know it I get hit in the head with a baseball bat. When I wake up, the year is 2069 and all I see is Donald trumps bright orange face staring me in the eyes. 👀 He whispers, “China China Vagina China” Then has a heart attack. 💔I wake up only to find myself laying in a field with no clothes. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP GUYS😰very scary
attributes.title: 1/10  stars😡✨

attributes.review: I just could not believe what was happening. First it toke weeks to download and when it did it put viruses on my phone and made it go slow and pictures of his face pop up on different apps!! Made me pass out the first time I was not ready for the jump scare:/ overall would not recommend for you it will kill your battery and mind
attributes.title: Why

attributes.review: This app is horrible. Not only did it take a week to download. I had to wait another three days for it to update. It also stole all my money and is using it to buy drugs. I really think this app needs help. It touches girl’s inappropriately and assumes that it is alright. This app is also racist. I would not recommend this app to anyone ever. Please do not waste your time like I did.
attributes.title: Never again.
